message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get closer to my target price.
